serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.
forbidden: Access denied. You do not have permission to perform this action.
notFound: The requested resource was not found.
fileUploadError: Error uploading file. Please try again.
aiError: Error occurred while processing AI request.
documentSizeExceeded: Document size exceeds maximum allowed limit.
rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
validationError: Validation error. Please check your inputs.
duplicateEntry: A record with this information already exists.
paymentRequired: Payment required to access this feature.
dataIntegrityError: Data integrity error. Please contact support.
notAuthorized: Not authorized to perform this action
loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
